list.name: ACH_LEVEL_0
list.description: Proof of one who has mastered the basics of this world and begun a great journey.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_1
list.description: Proof of one who has seen through the dark mysteries that lurked in Luxerion, bringing justice.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_2
list.displayName: Hope at the Edge of Despair
list.description: Proof of one who has stood upon the stage in glittering Yusnaan, bringing peace to the Patron.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_3
list.displayName: The Mystery of the Holy Clavis
list.description: Proof of one who has made it through the Dead Dunes to find ancient treasure.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_4
list.description: Proof of one who has visited the temple that towers over the Wildlands and touched the great Chaos.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_5
list.description: Proof of the true savior, who overthrew even the god of light to lead the people to a new world.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_6
list.description: Proof of making the impossible possible by using Eradia to bring the world a 14th day.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_7
list.displayName: A Father, a Son, and a Chocobo
list.description: Proof of helping a father and son reunite, bringing back a smile that seemed long lost.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_8
list.description: Proof of clearing 5 side quests. It is a fine beginning, but the journey is still long.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_9
list.description: Proof of clearing 25 side quests. It is a great feat to lead so many souls to salvation.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_10
list.description: Proof of nursing the holy chocobo back to full health among the rich pastures of the Wildlands.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_11
list.description: Proof of hunting down more than 30 lizards in the shifting sands of the Dead Dunes.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_12
list.description: Proof of restoring a sword, once broken, to its former glory and power.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_13
list.description: Proof of achieving victory in the lists of the Battle Arena 10 times.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_14
list.description: Proof of a brave warrior who has managed to claim 50 soul seeds from the Chaos.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_15
list.description: Proof of riding upon all of the great monorail lines that cross this shrinking world.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_16
list.description: Proof of building strong bridges to span the depths between continents, making all the world one.

list.name: ACH_LEVEL_17
list.description: Proof of clearing 25 quests that have appeared writ on the Canvas of Prayers.

list.name: ACH_MENU_0
list.description: Proof of improving your first weapon. Did you make something worthy?

list.name: ACH_MENU_1
list.description: Proof of improving your first shield. Use it wisely to guard yourself.

list.name: ACH_MENU_2
list.description: Proof of synthesizing your first ability. Did it prove useful?

list.name: ACH_MENU_3
list.description: Proof of upgrading your first accessory. Did you find the experience thrilling?

list.name: ACH_MENU_4
